name: Maia (itch) (Foxpancakes)
description:
Ruby video calls her girlfriend Maia. They haven't talked in awhile. 

A short kinetic novel that contains:

1000 words

1 CG

1 'cute' girlfriend

This is something I put together in 2 days as I decided to join the Yuri Game Jam last minute. I hope you can enjoy it for the short experience it is. :)

Credits:

Story, writing and programming by Foxpancakes

Sprite art by Teanao

CG art by mrsgoldenweek

Background art by Minikle

Music by Tim Beek

Fonts by Google Fonts

Thanks for playing <3
